Administrator Subclassing / Dual Class Drandum:
To master the skill of double class is not easy. Forget about past accomplishments, the new class - not the last. Now everything will be much more difficult. I will use special herbs to once again impose a stamp on skills already mastered. Price herbs - 20 million adena . Grass is always available, so you only have to pay and I at any time to make the abolition of certification. If you cancel the certification all certified skills that are now available to disappear, and the certificates are deleted. Well, cancel the certification?
